title: To Do App
description: TodoApp is a simple application built with React, leveraging custom hooks and the powerful useReducer for efficient state management, manage your personal to-do list

title: Gif Expert
description: Gif Expert App is a React-based application developed with JavaScript, utilizing an API to dynamically fetch gifs. find your favorite gifs

title: Weather App
description: WeatherApp is a React-based weather application powered by a weather API, delivering real-time weather information with simplicity and clarity
